languages.text: {n}Толпа ревет, вдохновленная словами истинного {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}дисциплинарного офицера{/d}. Рабочий утирается рукавом и складывает аквилу дрожащими руками, стоя плечом к плечу с избившим его блюстителем и забыв о талонах.{/n}

{n}The crowd roars, inspired by the words of a true {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disciplinary officer{/d}. The worker wipes his face on his sleeve and makes the sign of the Aquila with trembling hands. He is no longer thinking about ration cards as he stands side by side with the same enforcer who was just beating him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа ревет, вдохновленная словами истинного {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}дисциплинарного офицера{/d}. Рабочий утирается рукавом и складывает аквилу дрожащими руками, стоя плечом к плечу с избившим его блюстителем и забыв о талонах.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Menge tobt angesichts der Worte eines wahren {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Disziplinaroffiziers{/d}. Der Arbeiter wischt sich das Gesicht an seinem Ärmel ab und macht mit zitternden Händen das Zeichen des Adlers. Er denkt nicht mehr an Rationenkarten, als er Seite an Seite neben dem Enforcer steht, der ihn gerade noch verprügelt hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd roars, inspired by the words of a true {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disciplinary officer{/d}. The worker wipes his face on his sleeve and makes the sign of the Aquila with trembling hands. He is no longer thinking about ration cards as he stands side by side with the same enforcer who was just beating him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menge tobt angesichts der Worte eines wahren {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Disziplinaroffiziers{/d}. Der Arbeiter wischt sich das Gesicht an seinem Ärmel ab und macht mit zitternden Händen das Zeichen des Adlers. Er denkt nicht mehr an Rationenkarten, als er Seite an Seite neben dem Enforcer steht, der ihn gerade noch verprügelt hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La foule rugit, inspirée par le discours d'un véritable {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}officier en charge de la discipline{/d}. Le travailleur essuie son visage avec sa manche et fait le signe de l'Aquila de ses mains tremblantes. Il ne pense plus à ses tickets de rationnement tandis qu'il se tient aux côtés du prévôt qui le frappait quelques instants plus tôt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd roars, inspired by the words of a true {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disciplinary officer{/d}. The worker wipes his face on his sleeve and makes the sign of the Aquila with trembling hands. He is no longer thinking about ration cards as he stands side by side with the same enforcer who was just beating him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La foule rugit, inspirée par le discours d'un véritable {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}officier en charge de la discipline{/d}. Le travailleur essuie son visage avec sa manche et fait le signe de l'Aquila de ses mains tremblantes. Il ne pense plus à ses tickets de rationnement tandis qu'il se tient aux côtés du prévôt qui le frappait quelques instants plus tôt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La multitud enloquece, inspirada por las palabras de {mf|un auténtico|una auténtica} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}oficial {mf|disciplinario|disciplinaria}{/d}. El trabajador se limpia el rostro con la manga y hace el signo del Aquila con manos temblorosas. Ya no piensa en tarjetas de racionamiento cuando se sitúa junto al mismo guardia que hace escasos minutos estaba propinándole una paliza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd roars, inspired by the words of a true {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disciplinary officer{/d}. The worker wipes his face on his sleeve and makes the sign of the Aquila with trembling hands. He is no longer thinking about ration cards as he stands side by side with the same enforcer who was just beating him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La multitud enloquece, inspirada por las palabras de {mf|un auténtico|una auténtica} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}oficial {mf|disciplinario|disciplinaria}{/d}. El trabajador se limpia el rostro con la manga y hace el signo del Aquila con manos temblorosas. Ya no piensa en tarjetas de racionamiento cuando se sitúa junto al mismo guardia que hace escasos minutos estaba propinándole una paliza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆は、真なる{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}軍士官{/d}の言葉に鼓舞され、唸り声を上げる。労働者は袖で顔をぬぐい、震える手でアクィラの印を結ぶ。ついさっきまで自分を殴っていたエンフォーサーと並んでいる男は、すでに配給カードのことなど考えてもいない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd roars, inspired by the words of a true {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disciplinary officer{/d}. The worker wipes his face on his sleeve and makes the sign of the Aquila with trembling hands. He is no longer thinking about ration cards as he stands side by side with the same enforcer who was just beating him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆は、真なる{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}軍士官{/d}の言葉に鼓舞され、唸り声を上げる。労働者は袖で顔をぬぐい、震える手でアクィラの印を結ぶ。ついさっきまで自分を殴っていたエンフォーサーと並んでいる男は、すでに配給カードのことなど考えてもいない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你这位真正的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}纪律官员{/d}说出来的话语，让所有人都无比振奋，人群欢呼起来。刚刚挨了打的工人用袖子擦了擦脸，用颤抖的双手做了个帝国双头鹰手势。他与刚刚殴打他的执法者肩并肩站在一起，已经不再考虑配给卡的事情了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd roars, inspired by the words of a true {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disciplinary officer{/d}. The worker wipes his face on his sleeve and makes the sign of the Aquila with trembling hands. He is no longer thinking about ration cards as he stands side by side with the same enforcer who was just beating him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你这位真正的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}纪律官员{/d}说出来的话语，让所有人都无比振奋，人群欢呼起来。刚刚挨了打的工人用袖子擦了擦脸，用颤抖的双手做了个帝国双头鹰手势。他与刚刚殴打他的执法者肩并肩站在一起，已经不再考虑配给卡的事情了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hakiki bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disiplin subayının{/d} sözleriyle galeyana gelen kalabalıktan bir kükreme yükseliyor. İşçi, kıyafetinin koluyla yüzünü silerek titreyen elleriyle Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor. Az önce dayak yediği infazcı ile omuz omuza dururken artık aklından kumanya kartları geçmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd roars, inspired by the words of a true {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}disciplinary officer{/d}. The worker wipes his face on his sleeve and makes the sign of the Aquila with trembling hands. He is no longer thinking about ration cards as he stands side by side with the same enforcer who was just beating him.{/n}
